statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeAvailabilityData WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, availability_weekday FROM EmployeeAvailabilityData WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAvailabilityData WHERE availability_weekday = 'Monday' AND availability_start_time < '09:00:00';
SELECT employee_name, availability_start_time, availability_end_time FROM EmployeeAvailabilityData WHERE availability_weekday = 'Friday';
SELECT DISTINCT availability_weekday FROM EmployeeAvailabilityData ORDER BY availability_weekday DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM EmployeeAvailabilityData WHERE availability_weekday = 'Monday';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAvailabilityData WHERE availability_start_time < '09:00:00';
SELECT employee_name, availability_weekday, availability_start_time, availability_end_time FROM EmployeeAvailabilityData ORDER BY employee_name ASC, availability_weekday DESC;
SELECT employee_id, availability_weekday, availability_start_time, availability_end_time FROM EmployeeAvailabilityData WHERE employee_id > 100 ORDER BY availability_start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAvailabilityData WHERE availability_end_time > availability_start_time AND availability_weekday = 'Friday';
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, availability_time FROM Employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Meetings WHERE meeting_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_topic FROM Meetings WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY meeting_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, meeting_topic FROM Employees AS e INNER JOIN Meetings AS m ON e.employee_id = m.employee_id WHERE e.availability_time >= '09:00:00';
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, availability_time FROM Employees WHERE availability_time IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(meeting_id) AS meetings_attended FROM Meetings GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(meeting_id) > 2;
SELECT employee_name, meeting_date, meeting_time, meeting_topic FROM Employees JOIN Meetings ON Employees.employee_id = Meetings.employee_id WHERE meeting_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT meeting_topic, employee_name FROM Meetings JOIN Employees ON Meetings.employee_id = Employees.employee_id ORDER BY meeting_topic ASC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, availability_start_time FROM Employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT meeting_name, meeting_date, meeting_start_time, meeting_end_time FROM Meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT training_name, training_date, training_start_time, training_end_time FROM Trainings WHERE max_attendees > 10;
SELECT employee_name, availability_start_time, availability_end_time FROM Employees WHERE employee_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, availability_start_time FROM Employees ORDER BY availability_start_time DESC;
SELECT meeting_name, meeting_date, COUNT(employee_attendees) AS total_attendees FROM Meetings GROUP BY meeting_id HAVING total_attendees > 5;
SELECT * FROM Trainings WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01' AND training_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT training_name, training_date, trainer_id FROM Trainings ORDER BY training_date ASC, trainer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT employee_name, employee_email FROM TeamMembers WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT meeting_title, meeting_date, start_time, end_time FROM Meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT session_title, duration_hours, session_date FROM TrainingSessions WHERE duration_hours > 2;
SELECT employee_name, date, start_time, end_time FROM TeamAvailability WHERE date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT employee_name, employee_email FROM TeamMembers WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT session_title, session_date, start_time, end_time FROM TrainingSessions WHERE duration_hours >= 2;
SELECT employee_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM TeamAvailability WHERE date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT meeting_title, description, meeting_date, start_time FROM Meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Meetings;
SELECT meeting_name, start_time, end_time FROM Meetings;
SELECT employee_name, email_address FROM Employees;
SELECT * FROM Availability ORDER BY day_of_week ASC;
SELECT team_name, employee_name FROM Team JOIN Employees ON Team.team_lead = Employees.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM Meetings WHERE meeting_id = 1
SELECT meeting_name, start_time, end_time FROM Meetings ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT employee_name, email_address FROM Employees WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT team_name, employee_name FROM Team JOIN Employees ON Team.team_lead = Employees.employee_id
SELECT team_name, COUNT(member_id) AS total_members FROM Team JOIN Team_Members ON Team.team_id = Team_Members.team_id GROUP BY team_name
